Header.title: Social Art
Header.paragraph: “Your Art Can Speak For Itself. Now, Let It Be Social.”

About.paragraph: Social Art is a marketing company that specializes in the management of social media accounts for art galleries and studios all across the United States. We offer a vast array of tailored services that include (but are not limited to) daily posts on social media, website design, lead generation, and payment processing. Social Art’s goal is to foster engagements for art with anyone interested in the subject, from seasoned collectors to individuals looking to purchase their first piece. Our strategies and methods are proven to be both efficient and cost effective at helping galleries expand their reach on the internet. It’s time to bring the timelessness and prestige of the art world into the fast-paced realm of the 21st century. Your art speaks for itself, now let it be social.

Services.name: Social Media Optimization
Services.text: Through years of experience on social media, whether for personal or business reasons, we have pinpointed the unique ways to grow a following using proven algorithms to hit the high traffic times for YOUR social media accounts. We want to help YOU engage in YOUR followers, so they do the same with YOU! We not only run your social media accounts, but we also turn YOUR socials into a viable and necessary part of your business. From finely tuned, and fully customizable marketing campaigns to increase online sales, to creative event roll outs to increase foot traffic, Social Art has the social media know-how to help bolster any business’s digital footprint through Social Media.

Services.name: Lead Generation
Services.text: Using our very own proprietary software, we are able to create sales opportunities for YOU.

Services.name: Sales and Growth Analytics
Services.text: With our fully customizable dashboard, we are able to relay up to date sales and growth numbers to subscribers. YOUR dashboard can be 100% tailored to YOUR needs as a business owner/ manager, and will become an essential part of YOUR long term success. Our dashboard will not only help YOU see areas of opportunity, but it will also provide intel on specific areas that can be improved upon to maximize every opportunity.

Services.name: Custom Web Design
Services.text: We get it, designing the perfect website can be hard. You probably know how YOU want it to look, feel, and function, but how do you accomplish this?Not to worry, Social Art will take care of all your needs. Just tell us what YOU want, and we will turn your dream website into reality.

Services.name: SEO Management
Services.text: Ensuring that your business can be easily found online is often an overlooked part of creating a lasting digital footprint.

Services.name: Round the Clock Support
Services.text: At Social Art, customer satisfaction is our number one priority. We maintain and manage YOUR accounts with us consistently throughout the day, but we know issues still arise. We strive to resolve any issues in an effective and efficient manner. If YOU have any questions or concerns, feel free to reach out to us, and we will reach back out within the business day.
